title: Diccionarios en Python
description: Aprende a usar diccionarios (mapas clave-valor) en Python.
description_en: Learn to use dictionaries (key-value maps) in Python.
explanation: Se crean con llaves {} y se accede a los valores con la clave.
Son muy usados para representar objetos y configuraciones.
explanation_en: They are created with curly braces {} and values are accessed with the key.
They are widely used to represent objects and configurations.
